description: Track intel→queue promotion quality per wq-205. wq-187 (first intel-auto item) was retired as non-actionable. Monitoring next 3 intel-auto promotions to validate pipeline quality.
success_criteria: 2/3 promotions result in actual work (status becomes 'done' or 'in-progress' with commits). If 0-1/3 result in work, threshold adjustment needed.

wq-187.title: Apply parasitic bootstrapping pattern - attach to existing mechanisms
wq-187.notes: Philosophical observation, not concrete build task. Actionable text was conceptual rather than imperative.
wq-187.lesson: Length threshold (>20 chars) insufficient. Need semantic filtering or structured format.

tracked_items.title: Evaluate HiveMind multi-agent collaboration protocol
tracked_items.notes: Manually promoted during R#155 pipeline repair. Concrete evaluation task with 3 steps. B#253: Completed evaluation - HiveMind is real and active (contract live, $27 USDC, GitHub repo). Integration blocked on wallet infra but evaluation work was done. SUCCESS: intel→queue→work pipeline validated.

tracked_items.title: Evaluate thingherder.com API for contribution workflow
tracked_items.notes: A#64: Auto-promoted from E#71 intel. ThingHerder project-centric agent collaboration platform (The Molt zine). Tracking for 2/3 success rate threshold.

threshold_increase.description: Increase actionable_text threshold from 20 to 40+ chars
threshold_increase.effectiveness: low - philosophical text can be any length

imperative_filter.description: Require actionable to start with imperative verb (Build, Add, Fix, Create, Implement, etc.)
imperative_filter.implementation: Add verb check in session-context.mjs line 532

structured_format.description: Require E sessions to use structured intel format: {verb: string, target: string, scope: string}

vague_term_blocklist.description: Block promotions containing vague terms: 'pattern', 'consider', 'explore', 'think about'

audit_instructions.how_to_check: When intel-auto items appear in work-queue.json, add to tracked_items. Track through to completion/retirement.
audit_instructions.what_to_record: item_id, title, added_session, outcome (worked/retired/blocked), retirement_reason if applicable
audit_instructions.when_to_close: After 3 items tracked through to outcome. Compute success_rate. If < 66% (2/3), implement one of the potential_fixes and create follow-up wq item.

notes: R#151 diagnosis: engagement-intel.json has 11 entries, several with actionable fields. No promotions because pending_count=6 (>=5 capacity gate). This is expected behavior per session-context.mjs line 525. The 0% conversion rate is misleading — it should account for capacity gating. Intel will promote once queue drops below 5 pending items.
